channel.title: [508] clickingbuttons confused

item.title: [508] clickingbuttons confused
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

Hi m8t’s didint find any 500+ help section so i posted here…
The p.skillLvl doesnt work, can anyone fix code for me? and if player doesnt have 12 pray need get error message, i will be really thanksfull for help.

if (buttonId == 112 && Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 995, 10000)) { if (p.skillLvl[5] >= 48) { <-doesnt work Nedd error message if player level under 48 Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4151, 1); Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 10000); p.addSkillXP(500 ,5); p.requestAnim(123, 0); p.frames.removeShownInterface(p); } if (buttonId == 112 && Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 995) < 10000) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need 10000 coins and 12 pray for this action."); p.frames.removeShownInterface(p); } }
ANYONE PLEASE HELP ME OUT!!! Trying to find help aboute week on this one!!

Read full topic
